channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina journey to the Holy Land to visit sites related to the Resurrection. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the Crusades as eight expeditions undertaken, in fulfillment of a solemn vow, to deliver the Holy Places from Islamic control: the first, 1095-1101; the second, headed by Louis VII, 1145-47; the third, conducted by Philip Augustus and Richard Coeur-de-Lion, 1188-92; the fourth, during which Constantinople was taken, 1204; the fifth, which included the conquest of Damietta, 1217; the sixth, in which Frederick II took part (1228-29); also Thibaud de Champagne and Richard of Cornwall (1239); the seventh, led by St. Louis, 1249-52; the eighth, also under St. Louis, 1270. Next Connor describes the significant monastic influence, teaching and preaching of Ss. Norbert, Bruno, Bernard of Clairvaux, Francis of Assisi, Dominic Guzman, and Albert the Great. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Irak, Exode
channel.desc: Avec l?invasion de l?Irak et les attaques de l??tat islamique vou?es ? l??radication de la pr?sence chr?tienne et d?autres minorit?s dans le nord de l?Irak, le nombre de chr?tiens est pass? de 1,2 million ? moins de 300000 aujourd?hui. Cela a incit? l?Union europ?enne et le d?partement d??tat am?ricain ? d?clarer les chr?tiens et les autres minorit?s victimes de g?nocide. Depuis la lib?ration de Mossoul et des quelque 12 villages chr?tiens des plaines de Ninive, les chr?tiens irakiens d?plac?s qui sont rest?s rentrent lentement chez eux. Ce documentaire retrace les ?tapes de ce g?nocide et se penche sur l?avenir du christianisme en Irak. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the need to care for the poor in our communities and around the world. They conclude the series with a challenge to all men to follow the perfect will of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: EWTN Favorite and Scripture Scholar Fr. Mitch Pacwa analyzes Church Traditions and Teachings in light of Sacred Scripture during this weekly live program. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Aquinas
channel.desc: Fr. Aquinas Gabura, a 102-year-old Dominican Friar from Slovakia, recounts how he endured the persecution and imprisonment of Communist rule and later helped reestablish the Dominicans in his country. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: After they see the Lord?s glory in the Transfiguration, the apostles resolve to live only for him, the true meaning of discipleship. Mary too shows us how to follow Jesus, as we pray her rosary to obtain graces for souls. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Dynamic husband and wife radio team Jim and Joy Pinto bring their powerful witness to daytime TV with special guests and topics focusing on marriage, family, and pro-life issues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Uncover St. John of Avila?s legacy as the apostle of Andalusia and a role model for priests after the discovery of America in 1492 and the Spain?s restoration to Christianity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: ?thiopie, L?espoir Vit De L?autre Cote (refugies)
channel.desc: Le HCNUR estime que plus de 720 000 r?fugi?s (y compris des mineurs non accompagn?s) sont actuellement en ?thiopie en provenance du Soudan du Sud, de la Somalie et de l??rythr?e. S?par?s de leurs familles et confront?s ? un manque d?options d?installation ou de r?installation ? long terme, les r?fugi?s ressentent nostalgie et incertitude quant ? l?avenir, ce qui provoque frustrations, d?pression et d?pendance. Dans le camp de Shimelba, pr?s de 70 % des 8 000 r?fugi?s sont issus de tribus catholiques. Le p?re Ghiday Alema, originaire d?Adigrat, les visite chaque semaine, c?l?brant la messe, cat?chisant, ?coutant les gens, jouant avec les enfants ? essayant de donner de l?espoir dans une situation o? l?espoir semble presque perdu. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Every Wednesday night, Fr. Mitch Pacwa, interviews various guests seeking to teach and prepare us for evangelism. Learn more about your faith and reawaken your desire to bring others to the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord travel to Canada to explore the lives of the parents of the Blessed Virgin Mary, St. Anne and St. Joachim. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother discusses the unimaginable wonder and beauty of heaven and the angels and how the way to get there is through repentance. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Jennifer Hubbard, who lost her six-year-old daughter in the senseless, brutal massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary, explains how God?s grace helped her find hope, peace and even joy in the midst of unbelievable tragedy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough and Fr. Andrew Pinsent, Research Director at the University of Oxford, discuss how to cultivate a Life of Grace by accepting suffering, getting rid of clutter in our lives, and dedicating ourselves to prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: 21st International Festival Of Sacred Music And Art Universal Vespers
channel.desc: Andrea Mannucci?s Universal Vespers, inspired by Pope Francis? 2020 prayer in an empty St. Peter?s Square. Directed by Claude Villaret at the Basilica of St. John Lateran in Rome. (45 minutes).

channel.title: Crux
channel.desc: Bishop Donald Hying encourages viewers to live in the quiet of the moment in order to better hear and understand God?s plan for their lives. (15 minutes).

channel.desc: Bishop Fulton Sheen shows why removing the marital act from its proper context doesn?t liberate it but enslaves it. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: An animated biography on the early life of St. John Paul II up to his election as Pope. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Power In My Hands
channel.desc: Families share their personal stories and anecdotes testifying to the power of the Rosary. (90 minutes).
